codes:
n = int(input())

m = []
c = []

for i in range(n):
	m.append(list(map(int, input().split())))
	c.append(list(map(int, input().split())))

m.sort(reverse=True)
c.sort(reverse=True)

i = 0
result = "Mishka" if m[i][0] > c[i][0] else "Chris" if c[i][0] > m[i][0] else "Friendship is magic!"

while i < n:
	if m[i][0] == c[i][0]:
		result = result + "Mishka"
		i += 2
	else:
		result = result + "Chris"
		i += 2

if result == "Mishka":
	print("Mishka")
else:
	print("Chris")
